quote: Olga was better, in the sun, where he could see every pore in her skin. Get closer. Feel her next to him. It was all he wanted in the world. It was the last thing in the world that he could do.
quote_letters: OLGA WAS BETTER IN THE SUN WHERE HE COULD SEE EVERY PORE IN HER SKIN GET CLOSER FEEL HER NEXT TO HIM IT WAS ALL HE WANTED IN THE WORLD IT WAS THE LAST THING IN THE WORLD THAT HE COULD DO
